DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of 4 weeks treatment with AZD3199 in moderate to severe COPD.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of AZD3199 in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
DOC.criteria: COPD Current or exsmokers, 10 pack years Asthma Any clinically relevant abnormal findings at screening examinations Recent COPD exacerbation
